name: CLIMBING UP EVEREST
description:
CLIMBING UP EVEREST is a game about climbing up a mountain by dashing with your mouse while searching for gems. The game takes inspirations from games like Celeste. This is just a early build of the game so don't expect much of it.

CONTROLS:

Movement: Arrow Keys, AWSD, Any Gamepad.

Jump: Spacebar or Shift.

Dash: Left Button On The Mouse.
